column1: Smoque BBQ////If you love BBQ (smoked meat)
column2: this is the place to go. I've tried many others in the city and so far this is my favorite. If you go online
column3: you can view the menu. When you walk in to this place
column5: so get there early. There is usually a long line. If you are getting take-out
column6: just skip the line and head straight to the counter. I usually get the St. Louis style ribs (meatier than baby back) with the savory sauce on the side. If ribs are not your thing
column7: you can always get the brisket and pulled pork. What ever you get you won't be disappointed.
